e: ￹`Ma~`olah~ `ko~ `Ripon~ `a~ `tamdaw~ `a~ `mi~`ta'ong~.￺Japanese people like to bow a lot.￻日本人善於點頭行禮
d.f: ￹￺to bow * showing respect￻鞠躬，表示敬意

e: ￹`Ta'ongen~ `ko~ `singsi~ `iso~.￺Show respect to our teacher (by some physical sign) .￻向你的老師敬禮，你要尊敬你的老師
d.f: ￹￺to salute * to nod to￻敬禮，行禮

e: ￹`O~ `pi~`ta'ong~`an~ `a~ `romi'ad~ `anini~￺This is a day of worship.￻今天是主日禮拜
￹`O~ `pi~`ta'ong~`an~ `a~ `loma'~ `konini~.￺This is a place of worship / temple.￻這是敬拜的殿
￹`O~ `ta~`tapangan~ `no~ `saka~`citaneng~ `ko~ `pi~`ta'ong~ `to~ `Kawas~.￺Fear / worship of God is the beginning of wisdom￻敬畏神是智慧的開端
